On a mission to responsibly build
machine learning predictive models



Star


For R



  • Install from CRAN
  • install.packages("DALEX")

For Python


  • Install from PyPI
  • pip install dalex

Introduction: Explanatory Model Analysis: Explore, Explain, and Examine Predictive Models.
